name: pantomimist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who performs in pantomime (= in the UK, a funny musical play based on traditional children's stories, performed especially at Christmas) or mime (= acts or plays that use movements of your hands and body, and expressions on your face, without speech, to tell a story): He delighted children's audiences as a clown and pantomimist for over 50 years. He saw the opportunities for pantomimists in the silent movies.
